channel.title: My attempt to rise to riches through math and strategy. [To bored to continue]
channel.description:
[size=18pt]Im done with posting stuff on this cause its too dang boring. Sorry.[/size]
This post was re-written on March 16th 2011 to make it not so cluttered. [b]Goals: 10m 20m 30m 40m 60m 80m 100m 120m[/b]
[b]Current cash log:[/b] [code] March 16th 2011, 4:34PM: 40,000k March 16th 2011, 11:01PM: 43,814k March 17th 2011, 2:46PM: 45,397k March 18th 2011, 7:25PM: 48,682k [/code]
[b]Current photo, March 16th 2011:[/b] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/eimlfr.jpg[/img]
[b]March 14th 2011 photo:[/b] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/smyuxk.jpg[/img]
Old cash logs [code] Feb 25th 2011, 9:17AM: 10,231k Feb 25th 2011, 10:17AM: 10,470k Feb 25th 2011, 11:17AM: 10,689k Feb 25th 2011, 1:17PM: 11,097k Feb 25th 2011, 2:50PM: 11,594k Feb 25th 2011, 6:22PM: 13,003k Feb 26th 2011, 12:33PM: 14,200k Feb 28th 2011, 12:21Am: 18,001K March 10th 2011, 4:00PM 27,069k March 11th 2011, 5:29PM 31,640k March 11th 2011, 8:04PM 34,139K [/code]
Old images: [code] http://i52.tinypic.com/2cei7tc.jpg http://i52.tinypic.com/2cei7tc.jpg http://i55.tinypic.com/xmr0n9.jpg http://i55.tinypic.com/xmr0n9.jpg http://i52.tinypic.com/6ssahc.jpg http://i52.tinypic.com/6ssahc.jpg http://i56.tinypic.com/o7onyw.jpg[/code]
Want to learn how to do this yourself? Hop over to IlikeArrays thread on merching. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,479922.msg3513555.html#msg3513555

item.title: My attempt to rise to riches through math and strategy. [To bored to continue]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Ill send you an item im having alot of luck with right now.
me2me2

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:54, topic:383860”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=479621.msg3533569#msg3533569 date=1300391728]

10m was donated to you to begin with though, right?

He paid it back he said.

Yeah, but it’s much easier to start merching with 10m compared to 500k.

If you guys want the whole story, I got to 19m and got hacked by someone I thought was a trust-able person. Then I didn’t know what to do so I tried to recover my old account (radicalradzz) and after I got him back he had like 2m in items on it so I started to merch on it, then after a week or two I had 30m and I paid back my 10m debt that I was going to pay back on ilivetoomerch when I got to 50m and then I kept merching from there (: and yay im a likable new fag :3

Lol.

Wait, so how much did you start with? On the account you’re showing us.
[/quote]
I started with a set of mystic robes and 1.2m cash, kinda down grade from what I had before lol

Do you merch with a clan or pick your own items?

I pick my own items, I don’t trust merch clans.[/quote]
Oh, alright.

Read full topic

You said you are going to continue to edit this and show us your improvements, so it isn’t a bad thing that I give it a little bump.[/quote]
Haha sorries, I over reacted (: im working on this again. Thanks for the bump <3
